document_data.mainbody:
'''''Treasure of the Broken Hoard''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the [[Storm King's Thunder]] series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Parnast]] and [[Phlan]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 2{{nd}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''A famous relic hunter seeks adventurers to help her find caches of treasure hidden by the now-defeated followers of the Cult of the Dragon. Her maps and notes may lead the way to great wealth—or a terrible death. And do other parties have designs on the treasure as well?''|}}
